quote: People ignore design that ignores people.
author: Frank Chimero

quote: When UX doesn’t consider ALL users, shouldn’t it be known as “SOME User Experience” or… SUX
author: Billy Gregory

quote: The next big thing is the one that makes the last big thing usable.
author: Blake Ross

quote: Rule of thumb for UX: More options, more problems.
author: Scott Belsky

quote: Design isn’t finished until somebody is using it.
author: Brenda Laurel

quote: How do I explain what I do at a party? The short version is that I say I humanize technology.
author: Fred Beecher

quote: UI is the saddle, the stirrups, & the reins. UX is the feeling you get being able to ride the horse.
author: Dain Miller

quote: Design is everywhere. From the dress you’re wearing to the smartphone you’re holding, it’s design.
author: Samadara Ginige

quote: If you think good design is expensive, you should look at the cost of bad design.
author: Dr. Ralf Speth

quote: Design used to be the seasoning you’d sprinkle on for taste; now it’s the flour you need at the start of the recipe.
author: John Maeda

quote: Accidents often produce the best solutions…Only you can recognize the difference between an accident and your original intent.
author: Jennifer Morla

quote: If we want users to like our software, we should design it to behave like a likeable person: respectful, generous and helpful.
author: Alan Cooper

quote: Every great design begins with an even better story.
author: Lorinda Mamo

quote: If I had an hour to solve a problem and my life depended on the solution, I would spend the first 55 minutes determining the proper question to ask, for once I know the proper question, I could solve the problem in less than five minutes.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A problem well stated is a problem half solved.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: A consistent experience is a better experience.
author: Mark Eberman

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Design is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: There are three responses to a piece of design– yes, no, and WOW! Wow is the one to aim for.
author: Milton Glaser

quote: Want your users to fall in love with your designs? Fall in love with your users.
author: Dana Chisnell

quote: Good design is the most important way to differentiate ourselves from our competitors.
author: Yun Jong Yong

quote: Like all forms of design, visual design is about problem-solving, not about personal preference or unsupported opinion.
author: Bob Baxley

quote: Because every person knows what he likes, every person thinks he is an expert on user interfaces.
author: Paul Heckel

quote: Ease of use may be invisible, but its absence sure isn’t.
author: IBM

quote: If I have a thousand ideas and only one turns out to be good I am satisfied.
author: Alfred Nobel

quote: If you find an element of your interface requires instructions, then you need to redesign it.
author: Dan Rubin

quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
author: Hans Hofmann

quote: Genius is the ability to reduce the complicated to the simple.
author: C.W. Ceram

quote: Don’t stare at a blank page for too long, be bold, and make the first incisive stroke. The rest will come naturally.
author: James Kingman

quote: Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it’s really how it works.
author: Steve Jobs
